mapper.prompt:
Analyze the provided image and create a detailed, vivid description suitable for generating a similar image in FLUX AI. Focus on key visual elements such as objects, colors, lighting, textures, and composition. Use clear and descriptive language to capture the essence of the image. The description must not exceed 1100 characters.
Example output (based on the uploaded image):
A busy airport scene featuring a United Airlines airplane parked at the gate. The aircraft has a white fuselage with a bold United logo displayed on the side. In the background, several other planes are visible on the runway, along with airport ground vehicles and equipment. The skyline of a modern city stretches across the horizon, with tall buildings, including a skyscraper. The lighting is natural daylight with a slight haze, suggesting a warm summer day.
Do not use the following symbols in the text: ''', **, ***, #, ###, #, -, --, ---, ". Additionally, using text in quotation marks is prohibited.
